summary: The nemo.io package provides a comprehensive framework for model persistence and I/O operations within the NeMo ecosystem. It abstracts filesystem and PyTorch Lightning interactions, defines connector protocols for converting and managing data across storage backends, offers mixins for automatic model I/O and configuration capture, implements checkpoint handling (including specialized support for Megatron models), and supplies utilities for transforming model state dictionaries via patternâ€‘based mappings.
business_intent: Enable seamless saving, loading, exporting, and importing of NeMo models and their configurations across diverse storage environments, ensuring reproducibility, portability, and ease of integration with PyTorch Lightning workflows.
